name: Bitlab Interactive
description: Bitlab Interactive is a Mexican company founded in the year 2005 as an interactive agency. Bitlab has developed a good reputation in the market as a provider of web design, web development and online marketing services. It is also recognized for its technology services that include web hosting, managed dedicated servers and Workflux.net, the SaaS for Digital Asset Management developed by us. From the start, we have worked for more than 500 clients in Mexico, USA and Europe.
